data.name: ArticleSettingsHelp.Text
data.value: In this section, you can set up the settings that control the Article module.

data.name: EnableImagesHelp.Text
data.value: Check to allow portal images to be associated with articles.

data.name: EnableImagesExternal.Help
data.value: Check to allow external images to be associated with articles.

data.name: EnableCommentsHelp.Text
data.value: Check to allow comments to be posted with articles.

data.name: EnableRatingsHelp.Text
data.value: Check to allow ratings to be posted with articles.

data.name: EnableAnonymousCommentsHelp.Text
data.value: Check to allow comments to be posted by anonymous users.

data.name: EnableAnonymousRatingsHelp.Text
data.value: Check to allow ratings to be posted by anonymous users.

data.name: EnableCoreSearchHelp.Text
data.value: Check to allow core search integration for articles.

data.name: EnableSyndicationHelp.Text
data.value: Check to allow syndication of articles.

data.name: EnableSyndicationHtmlHelp.Text
data.value: Check to allow html tags in syndication.

data.name: EnableNotificationPingHelp.Text
data.value: Check to notify weblogs.com (when created or updated).

data.name: EnableAutoTrackbackHelp.Text
data.value: Check to scan articles for links when published and attempt to notify any linked sites.

data.name: EnableIncomingTrackbackHelp.Text
data.value: Check to allow incoming trackback/pings as new comments.

data.name: LaunchLinksHelp.Text
data.value: Check to launch links into page by itself (no other modules loaded).

data.name: BubbleFeaturedArticlesHelp.Text
data.value: Check to bring featured articles to the top of the listing.

data.name: plDisplayType.Help
data.value: Set the display mode for any occurance of a user.

data.name: ArticlePageSizeHelp.Text
data.value: Allows you to specify the default number of articles to page.

data.name: TemplateHelp.Text
data.value: Allows you to specify the template for displaying articles.

data.name: TextEditorWidth.Help
data.value: Enter the width of the text editor e.g. 100%, 400.

data.name: TimeZone.Help
data.value: Enter the time zone of the server.

data.name: TextEditorHeight.Help
data.value: Enter the height of the text editor e.g. 100%, 400.

data.name: MaxArticles.Help
data.value: Enter the maximum number of articles to return in current articles.

data.name: valMaxArticlesIsValid.ErrorMessage
data.value: Must be a valid value, e.g. 10, 20

data.name: CategoriesHelp.Text
data.value: Specify categories to only show articles from those categories.

data.name: ShowNotFeaturedOnlyHelp.Text
data.value: Only show articles not matched as 'Featured'.

data.name: SecureUrl.Help
data.value: Enter the url to redirect non-secured users.

data.name: NotifySubmissionHelp.Text
data.value: Notify users in the approval role of an article submission.

data.name: NotifySubmissionEmailHelp.Text
data.value: Notify this email address of an article submission.

data.name: NotifyApprovalHelp.Text
data.value: Notify owner of the article on approval.

data.name: NotifyCommentHelp.Text
data.value: Notify owner of the article when a comment is posted.

data.name: SortByHelp.Text
data.value: Select field to sort articles by.

data.name: ModuleHelp.Text
data.value:
Main Options

This module allows administrators to set options for the News Articles module.

data.name: EnableCommentModeration.Help
data.value: Check to require comments to be moderated before posting.

data.name: plNotifyCommentEmail.Help
data.value: Notify email address(s) on comment, separate with a ;

data.name: TextEditorSummaryHeight.Help
data.value: Enter the height of the text editor e.g. 100%, 400.

data.name: TextEditorSummaryWidth.Help
data.value: Enter the width of the text editor e.g. 100%, 400.

data.name: FormSettings.Help
data.value: Show/hide features on the 'Create Article' form.

data.name: FormSettingsHelp.Text
data.value: * A role must have submit permissions to view the above items on the create article form.

data.name: RequireCategory.Help
data.value: Check to require a category when creating an article.

data.name: ShowNotSecuredOnly.Help
data.value: Only show articles not marked as 'Secure'.

data.name: DefaultCategories.Help
data.value: Check categories to auto-select them on the create article screen.

data.name: TextEditorSummaryMode.Help
data.value: Select how to render the summary text area.

data.name: HoldCtrl.Text
data.value: Hold down ctrl to select multiple.

data.name: ArchiveAuthor.Help
data.value: Check to show authors on the archives page.

data.name: ArchiveCategories.Help
data.value: Check to show categories on the archives page.

data.name: ArchiveCurrentArticles.Help
data.value: Check to show current articles on the archives page.

data.name: ArchiveMonth.Help
data.value: Check to show months on the archives page.

data.name: CategorySelectionHeight.Help
data.value: Enter the height of the category selection listbox, e.g. 200, 400

data.name: CategoryBreadcrumb.Help
data.value: Check to include in the page's breadcrumb.

data.name: CategoryName.Help
data.value: Check to include in the page's name.

data.name: NotifyDefault.Help
data.value: Check to make the notification checkbox on by default.

data.name: SyndicationLinkMode.Help
data.value: Select to always link to an article or directly to attachment/article.

data.name: ExpandSummary.Help
data.value: Check to expand summary by default.

data.name: plSmartThinkerStoryFeed.Help
data.value: Check to integrate with the Smart-Thinker Story Feed (Smart-Thinker UserProfile 4.3.12+)

data.name: plSmartThinkerStoryFeed.Text
data.value: Publish Group Events to Smart-Thinker Story Feed

data.name: plTitleReplacement.Help
data.value: Select a character to replace spaces in title with.

data.name: SyndicationSummaryLength.Help
data.value: Optionally enter a maximum number of characters to show in RSS summary.

data.name: valSyndicationSummaryLengthIsValid.ErrorMessage
data.value: Must be a valid number e.g. 100, 200

data.name: EnableSyndicationEnclosures.Help
data.value: Check to enable enclosures in syndication.

data.name: plSyndicationEnclosureType.Help
data.value: Specify which field to use for enclosures.

data.name: plLoggedInUser.Help
data.value: Check to filter by the logged in user.

data.name: plQueryStringFilter.Help
data.value: Check to filter by author on the querystring parameter.

data.name: plQueryStringParam.Help
data.value: Enter the name of the parameter to filter on.

data.name: plUsernameParam.Help
data.value: Specify what parameter to select from.

data.name: MenuPosition.Help
data.value: Specify where to place the menu.

data.name: plAlwaysShowPageID.Help
data.value: Check to always show PageID in the url.

data.name: plDefaultImageFolder.Help
data.value: Select the default image folder. Users will only be able to select this folder or its child folders.

data.name: ShorternID.Help
data.value: Specify an alias for article ID in shorterned mode.

data.name: UrlMode.Help
data.value: Select a url mode for formatting urls.

data.name: NotifyCommentApproval.Help
data.value: Check to notify approvers when a comment requires approval.

data.name: NotifyCommentApprovalEmail.Help
data.value: Notify email address(s) when a comment requires approval, separate with a ;

data.name: NotifyCommentApprovalEmail.Text
data.value: Notify Email Address for Comment Approval

data.name: plUseCanonicalLink.Help
data.value: Check to use the canonical link in the head tag.

data.name: MaxAge.Help
data.value: Maximum age of articles (days), leave blank for no filter.

data.name: SyndicationMaxCount.Help
data.value: Specify the maximum number of items to display in an RSS feed.

data.name: plRelatedMode.Help
data.value: Pick a mode to show related articles.

data.name: plBitLyAPIKey.Help
data.value: The API key for generating bit.ly urls.

data.name: plBitLyLogin.Help
data.value: The login for generating bit.ly urls.

data.name: plTwitterName.Help
data.value: Your twitter username to be used in [TWITTERNAME]

data.name: AdminSettings.Help
data.value: Customise the settings usually available to host only.

data.name: plImageMaxHeight.Help
data.value: Specify the maximum image height to resize.

data.name: plImageMaxWidth.Help
data.value: Specify the maximum image width to resize.

data.name: plResizeImages.Help
data.value: Check to resize images upon upload.

data.name: valImageMaxHeightIsNumber.ErrorMessage
data.value: Image Max Height must be a number.

data.name: valImageMaxWidthIsNumber.ErrorMessage
data.value: Image Max Width must be a number.

data.name: plIncludeJQuery.Help
data.value: Check to include the jquery script.

data.name: plAuthorSelection.Help
data.value: Specity the author selection mode for add/edit article.

data.name: EnableImagesUpload.Help
data.value: Check to enable uploading of new images.

data.name: plDefaultFileFolder.Help
data.value: Specify the default folder to upload files. Users will only be able to select this folder or its child folders.

data.name: plActiveSocial.Help
data.value: Check to publish events to the Active Social wall

data.name: UseWatermark.Help
data.value: Check to apply a watermark on uploaded images. The watermark is applied during the upload process.

data.name: WatermarkImage.Help
data.value: Specify an image to apply as a watermark.

data.name: WatermarkPosition.Help
data.value: Specify the position to place the watermark image.

data.name: WatermarkText.Help
data.value: Specify a text string to apply as a watermark.

data.name: plActiveSocialCommentKey.Help
data.value: Specify the access key for comment

data.name: plActiveSocialRateKey.Help
data.value: Specify the access key for rate

data.name: plActiveSocialSubmissionKey.Help
data.value: Specify the access key for submission

data.name: AddArticleInstances.Help
data.value: Select portal/module combination to be available for sharing articles.

data.name: ContentSharing.Text
data.value: Allows articles to be shared from other portals.

data.name: ContentSharingNoneAvail.Text
data.value: No article instances available in other portals.

data.name: HideWebsite.Help
data.value: Check to hide website on the comment form.

data.name: plExpandMetaInformation.Help
data.value: Expand meta information on the submit article form.

data.name: plUniquePageTitles.Help
data.value: Check to enforce unique page titles in articles.

data.name: CategoryFilterSubmit.Help
data.value: Filter categories on submit article screen.

data.name: UseStaticTagsList.Help
data.value: Check to only allow existing tags to be used on submit article screen, otherwise allow article authors to create new tags while authoring an article. When checked, a list box will be used to select existing tags (similar to categories), rather then the text box used when unchecked.

data.name: AuthorDefault.Help
data.value: Specify a default author for creating articles

data.name: RoleGroup.Help
data.value: Optionally filter roles by role group.

data.name: AkismetKey.Help
data.value: Specify an Akismet key to protect against comment spam.

data.name: plJournalIntegration.Help
data.value: Check to integrate Create, Comment & Rate Article into journal.

data.name: plJournalIntegrationGroups.Help
data.value: Check security on categories and post to associates social groups/roles if applicable.

data.name: CaptchaType.Help
data.value: Select the type of captcha to use on the post comment screen.

data.name: reCaptchaSecretKey.Help
data.value: Google reCaptcha Secret Key, only needed when CaptchaType is set to reCaptcha.

data.name: reCaptchaSiteKey.Help
data.value: Google reCaptcha Site Key, only needed when CaptchaType is set to reCaptcha.

data.name: EnablePortalFilesHelp.Text
data.value: Check to allow portal files to be associated with articles.
